name: quicksight-portal-lambda
description: QuickSight Portal Lambda - Express-free, pure handlers

scripts.build: npm run lint:fix && npm run typecheck && npm test && npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production node build.js
scripts.build:quick: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production node build.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run kill-sam && cd ../../sam && sam build && sam local start-api --env-vars env.json --port 3000 --host 0.0.0.0 --warm-containers EAGER
scripts.dev:quick: npm run build:quick && npm run kill-sam && cd ../../sam && sam build && sam local start-api --env-vars env.json --port 3000 --host 0.0.0.0 --warm-containers EAGER
scripts.dev:debug: npm run build && npm run kill-sam && cd ../../sam && sam build && sam local start-api --env-vars env.json --port 3000 --host 0.0.0.0 --debug --warm-containers EAGER
scripts.build:with-coverage: npm run lint:fix && npm run typecheck && npm run test:coverage && npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production node build.js
